default.title: To enjoy Buddyya, student verification is required!
default.description: Complete the student verification and enjoy more features of Buddyya.

pending.title: Your student verification is under review
pending.description: Verification may take up to one day to complete. Your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.

studentId.title: Please upload a photo to prove that you are a student
studentId.description: The photo must clearly show that you are a student at the school. The photo will be discarded immediately after review.

permission.gallery: Gallery access is required to select an image.

email.title: Please enter your university email.
email.description: A verification code has been sent to your email
email.label: School email
email.footer: Your information will not be shared nor shown on your profile.
email.warning: Please enter a valid email address.

verification.title: Please enter the verification code.
verification.titleDescription: A verification code has been sent to {{email}}.
verification.spam: Please also check your spam or junk folder.
verification.label: Verification code

verificationComplete.title: Student verification is complete!
verificationComplete.description:
Your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.
Start enjoying campus life with Buddyya.

studentIdComplete.title: Student verification request completed.
studentIdComplete.description: It typically takes about 3 hours to complete the review, and your personal information will not be used for any purpose other than verification.
